name: nutcase
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal someone who behaves in an extremely silly way: Only complete nutcases like myself swim in the sea in winter.
offensive an offensive word for a person who has a mental illness
More examplesFewer examplesYou'd have to be a total nutcase to turn down such an opportunity.He's a bit of a nutcase on the football pitch.It doesn't take long for her to realize she's married to a nutcase.They said Mr Smith was a "nutcase" and a "psycho" who they had "wound up" for fun.
